TopicTitle: What type of music is this?

Articles.Content:
I've heard lots of music like this, but have never been able to put a name or genre on it. My best example is the music playing in the background is of this video: https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&ei=IMOLU4eYIemxsATd_ICgCw&url=http://www.youtube.com/watch%3Fv%3DNZxPXkKpYaA&cd=4&ved=0CEEQtwIwAw&usg=AFQjCNErGa4kfXrs_vE0d6AVOMW9t7AHvg&sig2=X57KfnpcMBXVoIaTfwfICQ

That acoustic, major-key, fluid-ish sound, is there a genre name for that, because I really like the sound of it. Just curious if anyone knows.

If you were to search for "Ambient" and "chillout" you'd probably find some similar stuff. Stick an "orchestral" in there as a keyword too to avoid heavy synthesizer usage.
